text: We collect the email addresses of those who communicate with us via email and the website, aggregate information on what pages consumers access or visit, and information volunteered by the consumer (such as survey information and/or site registrations).

When you register for an account with Spotlight.ai, we ask for information such as your name, email address, and phone Spotlight.ai uses collected information for the following general purposes: products and services provisioning, identification and authentication, service improvement, contact, and research.

We collect the email addresses of those who communicate with us via email and the website, aggregate information on what pages consumers access or visit, and information volunteered by the consumer (such as survey information and/or site registrations).
We use encryption to protect your information.

General

  We transfer information about you if Spotlight.ai is acquired by or merged with another company.

may disclose personally identifiable information under special circumstances such as to comp ly with subpoenas.

We store your personal information for a period of time that is consistent with our business purposes.
We will retain your personal information for the length of time needed to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
